title: COTTAGE PIE
directions: Pre-heat oven to 200 °C/190 °C fan/ Gas mark 6.
Heat the oil in a saucepan over a moderate heat and fry the onion and the mince together until browned.
Add tomato puree and flour and stir through.
Add the stock whilst stirring and bring back to the boil, cook for 2 minutes or until thickened, stir through the Knorr Mixed Herb Flavour Pot.
Pour into a suitable casserole dish, and top with mashed potato, dot with the Buttery.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
